participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and passionate, he often reflects on his dreams and relationships.
participant_1.background: I really wanted to be an actor. I am in medical school. I am in love with a girl who is unaware of it. I do community theater when I'm not in school. Both of my parents are doctors.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Creative and outgoing, she loves to express herself through her vibrant hair and enjoys connecting with others.
participant_2.background: I dyed my hair pink. I work in a bookstore. I live in the city. I have an older brother.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I work in a bookstore. It's pretty fun!
That sounds like a great job. I've always loved reading.
Me too! I read a lot of different things, but I'm always looking for new books to read.
What are you reading right now?
I'm currently reading a book about the history of the city I live in. It's been really interesting to learn more about the place I call home.
That sounds like a really cool book. I've always been interested in history.
Me too! I think it's important to know about the past in order to understand the present.
I agree. I think history is really important for understanding the world around us.
I'm glad you agree. I think it's a really important subject.
So, what do you like to do outside of work?
I like to go out to eat, explore the city, and spend time with my family and friends.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies.
I do! I like to keep busy.
So, what are you looking for in a friend?
I'm looking for someone who is kind, funny, and intelligent.
I think we could be friends.
I think so too.
Great! I'd love to get to know you better.
Me too!
